name: jssm
description: A Javascript state machine with a simple API. Well tested, and typed with Flowtype. MIT License.

scripts.removedir: rimraf build -f && rimraf dist -f && rimraf docs -f
scripts.createdir: mkdir build && mkdir dist && mkdir docs && cd docs && mkdir docs && cd ..
scripts.clean: npm run removedir && rm -f src/js/jssm-dot.js && npm run createdir
scripts.make: npm run clean && npm run peg && npm run babel && npm run rename && npm run setver && npm run pack
scripts.peg: rm -f src/js/jssm-dot.js && pegjs src/js/jssm-dot.peg && cp src/js/jssm-dot.js build/
scripts.vet: npm run flow && npm run eslint
scripts.audit: echo \"major\" remaining. . : `grep major src/js/jssm*.js | wc -l`\\n\"wasteful\" remaining : `grep wasteful src/js/jssm*.js | wc -l`\\n\"any\" remaining. . . : `grep any src/js/jssm*.js | wc -l`\\n\"mixed\" remaining. . : `grep mixed src/js/jssm*.js | wc -l`\\n\"todo\" remaining . . : `grep todo src/js/jssm*.js | wc -l`\\n\"nextdo\" remaining . : `grep nextdo src/js/jssm*.js | wc -l`\\n\"whargarbl\" remaining: `grep whargarbl src/js/jssm*.js | wc -l`\\n\"comeback\" remaining : `grep comeback src/js/jssm*.js | wc -l`\\n\"fixme\" remaining. . : `grep fixme src/js/jssm*.js | wc -l`\\n\"stochable\" remaining: `grep stochable src/js/jssm*.js | wc -l`\\n\"checkme\" remaining. : `grep checkme src/js/jssm*.js | wc -l`
scripts.qbuild: npm run make && npm run test-verbose && npm run minify && npm run docs && npm run site && npm run dist
scripts.build: npm run make && npm run vet && npm run test-verbose && npm run audit && npm run minify && npm run docs && npm run site && npm run dist
scripts.nyc-build: npm run vet && npm run make && npm run test-verbose && npm run audit && npm run nyc-test
scripts.travis: rm -f src/js/jssm-dot.js && npm run nyc-build && npm run nyc-test && npm run coverage

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
